messages.title: How we can change the future together

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER, Australian-style points-based system to decide who gets to stay and who doesn't.
UKIP will pour the money that we currently send to the EU into our NHS instead.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage; Â£6.2 BILLION boost for 2.5 million children.
Stop sending our money overseas and ensure that the foreign aid budget is spent on our priorities, NOT on building an airport abroad that you can't land planes at.

leaflet.additionalNotes: NO MORE LEAFLETS. THANK YOU for posting this door to door!
